Definition.WordDefinition: Worshipper (Gr. neocoros = temple-sweeper (Acts 19:35) of the great goddess Diana). This name neocoros appears on most of the extant Ephesian coins

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Worshiper \Wor"ship*er\, n. One who worships; one who pays divine honors to any being or thing; one who adores. [Written also {worshipper}.] [1913 Webster]
worshipper n 1: a person who has religious faith [syn: {believer}, {worshiper}] 2: someone who admires too much to recognize faults [syn: {worshiper}]
